enemies.groupName: Lower Norfair Fireflea Room Bottom Fune
Lower Norfair Fireflea Room Top Funes

strats.name: G-Mode Morph Blind Top to Bottom - Power Bomb the Bottom Fune (Top Left Door)

requires.notable: G-Mode Morph Blind Top to Bottom

note: Traversing the room without getting hit requires fairly tricky off-screen movement.
Note that Samus moves freely through the off-screen Funes, but will take damage from the Boulders.
The Boulders will behave normally and start to roll as Samus is in front of them, except for the top Boulder.
Roll off the first ledge and immediately roll to the right all the way to the right wall. Use Spring Ball or a horizontal bomb boost to get over the next Boulder.
Quickly roll off the left edge and back to the right in order to avoid the third Boulder.
Roll to the right wall then the left wall and place a Power Bomb, exit G-Mode, and jump repeatedly to fix the camera.

strats.name: Crystal Flash, R-Mode Spark Interrupt
note: Crystal Flash, then pick up a shinecharge.
Drop into the top Fune's fireball path for the interupt.

strats.name: Farm For Energy, R-Mode Spark Interrupt
note: With Supers or PBs, kill Funes except for the topmost.
If you have neither, use Morph and bombs or springball to get over the secret Fune and
farm a fireflea. Shinespark can get you back out of the fireflea pit if you can't jump out.
devNote: FIXME: Notable strat 'Morph Over The Fune' for getting over the secret fune (and then R-Jump to get out) isn't included.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph Blind Top to Bottom - Jump over the Bottom Fune (Top Left Door)

requires.notable: G-Mode Morph Blind Top to Bottom

note: Traversing the room without getting hit requires fairly tricky off-screen movement.
Note that Samus moves freely through the off-screen Funes, but will take damage from the Boulders.
The Boulders will behave normally and start to roll as Samus is in front of them, except for the top Boulder.
Roll off the first ledge and immediately roll to the right all the way to the right wall. Use Spring Ball or a horizontal bomb boost to get over the next Boulder.
Quickly roll off the left edge and back to the right in order to avoid the third Boulder.
Roll to the right wall then the left wall and use Spring Ball to jump over the Fune, exit G-Mode, and jump repeatedly to fix the camera.
strats.devNote: This is only useful if the item is Morph or a way to kill the Fune.

strats.name: Fune Farm
strats.devNote: An extra Power Bomb can be used but an extra Fireflea farm is included in that case.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph Power Bomb the Fune
strats.note: Place a Power Bomb then exit G-Mode to kill the Fune.

strats.name: Come in Shinecharged - Gain Flash Suit (Spikesuit)
note: Precise timing is required to dodge the fune's fireballs.

strats.name: Gain Flash Suit (Spikesuit) - Leave with Shinespark
Come in Shinecharged - Gain Blue Suit (X-Mode)
note: Precise timing is required to dodge the fune's fireballs.

strats.name: R-Mode Spark Interrupt
note: Kill the Fune. Crystal Flash or farm the top fireflea. After the shine charge,
jump up to the first fune and take a fireball to interrupt.
Note: farming more than the top fireflea while still in R-Mode will cause Samus to
become difficult to see.

strats.name: Kill One Fune
strats.note: Clear one of the paired Fune heads with a Super Missile or Power Bomb.  Run from or jump over the Boulders.

strats.name: Kill Many Enemies
note: Boulders can be killed by Super Missiles or by Pseudo Screwing.
Funes are weak to Super Missiles and Power Bombs.

strats.name: Ice
strats.note: Freeze the Fune heads and run from the Boulders.

strats.name: Screw Attack
strats.note: The 2 Funes plus Boulder can be tricky.  Try to activate the Boulder before jumping up to that platform.

strats.name: Spring Ball
strats.note: Use SpringBall to get up and over the Fune.

strats.name: Bombs
note: Place a bomb just a bit left of the Fune and have it boost Samus horizontally to get over the Fune.
The bomb can be placed at a similar time to when the Fune shoots a fireball.
Alternatively, it is possible to land on a fireball to be boosted up.

strats.name: Morph Over the Fune
note: A paricularly precise mid-air morph can get up and over the Fune without damage.
Stand a half tile away from the Fune when jump morphing for a higher ceiling.
It's a 2.5 tile high mid air morph. It can be performed similar to how a 2 or 3 tile high morph is performed.
strats.devNote: It is possible but very hard to jump morph over the fune with a flash suit.  R jumping helps.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph Jump over the Fune
strats.devNote: This is only useful if the item is Morph or a way to kill the Fune.

strats.name: Grapple Teleport X-Ray Climb (1 Screen)
note: Exit the previous room with Samus in a standing pose (while grappled).
After teleporting, press right to release Grapple while staying standing (not being forced into a crouch).
Then X-ray climb 1 screen to get up to the door transition, without needing to open the door.
Samus will not be visible during the climb.

strats.name: Grapple Teleport X-Ray Climb (2 Screens)
note: Exit the previous room with Samus in a standing pose (while grappled).
After teleporting, press right to release Grapple while staying standing (not being forced into a crouch).
Then X-ray climb 2 screens to get up to the door transition, without needing to open the door.
Samus will not be visible during the climb.

strats.name: Morph
note: Roll under the top Fune fireball then roll off the edge to avoid the first Boulder.
Kill a Fune or use the Boulder for i-frames to get through the tricky section.
It is also possible to Kago the Fune to save health compared to taking a Boulder hit.

strats.name: Space Jump
strats.note: Use Space Jump to reset Samus' fall speed, by jumping, to avoid the topmost boulder.

strats.name: Top to Bottom Itemless Damageless
note: An extremely precise spinjump or walljump can avoid the top Boulder.
The spinjump requires dash state and to jump right away.
Aiming down shortly after helps by reducing Samus' hitbox.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph Blind Top to Bottom - Power Bomb the Bottom Fune (Top Right Door)

requires.notable: G-Mode Morph Blind Top to Bottom

note: Traversing the room without getting hit requires fairly tricky off-screen movement.
Note that Samus moves freely through the off-screen Funes, but will take damage from the Boulders.
The Boulders will behave normally and start to roll as Samus is in front of them, except for the top Boulder.
Roll off the first ledge and immediately roll to the right all the way to the right wall. Use Spring Ball or a horizontal bomb boost to get over the next Boulder.
Quickly roll off the left edge and back to the right in order to avoid the third Boulder.
Roll to the right wall then the left wall and place a Power Bomb, exit G-Mode, and jump repeatedly to fix the camera.

strats.name: Crystal Flash, R-Mode Spark Interrupt
note: Crystal Flash, then pick up a shinecharge.
Drop into the top Fune's fireball path for the interupt.

strats.name: Farm For Energy, R-Mode Spark Interrupt
note: With Supers or PBs, kill Funes except for the topmost.
If you have neither, use Morph and bombs or springball to get over the secret Fune and
farm a fireflea. Shinespark can get you back out of the fireflea pit if you can't jump out.
devNote: FIXME: Notable strat 'Morph Over The Fune' for getting over the secret fune (and then R-Jump to get out) isn't included.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph Blind Top to Bottom - Jump over the Bottom Fune (Top Left Door)

requires.notable: G-Mode Morph Blind Top to Bottom

note: Traversing the room without getting hit requires fairly tricky off-screen movement.
Note that Samus moves freely through the off-screen Funes, but will take damage from the Boulders.
The Boulders will behave normally and start to roll as Samus is in front of them, except for the top Boulder.
Roll off the first ledge and immediately roll to the right all the way to the right wall. Use Spring Ball or a horizontal bomb boost to get over the next Boulder.
Quickly roll off the left edge and back to the right in order to avoid the third Boulder.
Roll to the right wall then the left wall and use Spring Ball to jump over the Fune, exit G-Mode, and jump repeatedly to fix the camera.
strats.devNote: This is only useful if the item is Morph or a way to kill the Fune.

strats.name: Ice Bridge
note: Avoid killing the Firefleas and instead freeze them as a way accross the spikes.
It helps to freeze them low, closer to the spikes.

strats.name: X-Mode Shinespark
note: After armpumping for a while Samus will start to move forwards again, when this happens armpump to move forward one tile

strats.name: Gain Flash Suit (X-Mode Spikesuit) - Shinespark up.
note: After armpumping for a while Samus will start to move forwards again, when this happens armpump to move forward one tile

strats.name: Ice Bridge
note: Avoid killing the Firefleas and instead freeze them as a way accross the spikes.
It helps to freeze them low, closer to the spikes.

strats.name: Frozen Fireflea
strats.note: Be careful not to touch the Firefleas or they will die.

strats.name: Bug Boost Escape
note: Set up to Damage boost off the highest Fireflea at the apex of Samus' jump, right next to the statue's claw.
The positioning of the Fireflea is very precise, and this can only be attempted once.
To position the Fireflea, jump to move it on camera and move it off camera while it is at the top of its circle.
Be careful not to touch the Fireflea while setting up its precise positioning.
Note that morphing can make the boost a little easier, and a crouch jump can also help, but is not required.

strats.name: IBJ
strats.note: IBJ on the right side of the platform.

strats.name: Wall Jump Damage Boost
strats.note: This can only be attempted once.

strats.name: Spring Ball
strats.note: Use SpringBall to get up and over the Fune.  Jump when slightly away from the Fune.

strats.name: Bombs
strats.note: Use a Bomb to get up and over the Fune.

strats.name: R Jump Over the Fune
strats.devNote: There is a way to walljump morph over the Fune, but a pause buffer is magnitudes easier.

strats.name: Gain Flash Suit - (Spikesuit)
devNote: No leniency added becuase can farm the firefleas.

strats.name: Gain Flash Suit - Shinespark up.
note: Failing the spikesuit without a way to get back up to the junction results in a softlock.

notables.name: G-Mode Morph Blind Top to Bottom
note: Traversing the room without getting hit requires fairly tricky off-screen movement.
Note that Samus moves freely through the off-screen Funes, but will take damage from the Boulders.
The Boulders will behave normally and start to roll as Samus is in front of them, except for the top Boulder.
Roll off the first ledge and immediately roll to the right all the way to the right wall. Use Spring Ball or a horizontal bomb boost to get over the next Boulder.
Quickly roll off the left edge and back to the right in order to avoid the third Boulder.
Roll to the right wall then the left wall and either place a Power Bomb the Fune or use Spring Ball to jump over it.
Exit G-Mode, and jump repeatedly to fix the camera.

notables.name: Morph Over the Fune
note: A paricularly precise mid-air morph can get up and over the Fune without damage.
Stand a half tile away from the Fune when jump morphing for a higher ceiling.
It's a 2.5 tile high mid air morph. It can be performed similar to how a 2 or 3 tile high morph is performed.
